data.name: Blackout Rugby Manager - Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Contains:
  • 1 Month of Premium - Includes 100 tokens per month, full access to the Assistant Manager, and many other in-game benefits!
  • A deck of cards - containing 10 cards, with at least 1 epic, to use in-game
  • A cosmetic shield to spruce up your club (Premium Shield D10)
This pack can only be purchased once per account, and can be redeemed in game under Settings -> DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Multi Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min screen size: 1280x720

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10
  • Processor: Multi core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Multi core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
